name: Name
2fa_info_1: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a security process that requires the user to provide two means of identification to perform sensitive transactions or access their account.
2fa_info_2: At the moment, if your balance has a total amount of all assets of $1000 or more, financial transactions and purchases and sales are possible only after passing 2FA, however, if your balance has a smaller amount and you want to protect your assets now - enable 2FA without waiting for the $1000 threshold,
2fa_info_3:
Two layers of security - your password and a unique special code generated by the authentication application installed on your smartphone or PC.
The most popular authentication applications are Google Authenticator ({Android} or {iPhone}) and {Authy }. You can see how to set up and work {hear}.
2fa_info_4: Please, before activating 2FA, save your QR Code Key in a safe place and do not give it to anyone. It will be needed to restore access in case of loss of control over the device with the application installed. You can also use it in PC applications when there is no way to scan a QR code, like the example {KeePassXC}
2fa_info_5: Scan the QR code in the authentication application and enter the resulting 6-digit numeric code below.
